text: Jordan is a country in the Middle East, officially called the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan. It is known for the ancient city of Petra and its capital Amman.
Michael Jordan is a former professional basketball player widely considered one of the greatest in NBA history.
Apple Inc. is a technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California. It designs and sells consumer electronics like the iPhone and Mac computers.
An apple is a sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree. It comes in many varieties such as Fuji, Gala, and Granny Smith and is rich in fiber and vitamin C.
The Amazon River is the largest river by discharge volume of water in the world. It flows through South America and supports a diverse ecosystem.
Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.
